sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './About.css' const About = ({pokemon}) => { return (
{pokemon.map(poke => (
Base Experience :
{poke.base_experience}
Height :
{poke.height * 10} cm
Weight :
{poke.weight / 10} kg
Abilities :
{poke.abilities.map(ability => ( {ability.ability.name}, ))}
))}
) } export default About
